trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around April 24th 2010
Summary: Roundish (very large) object flying at about 35,000 ft over Portland OR-many witnesses.
divs: sighting detailsa friend and i were walking up to greater trumps on hawthorne street in portland or. as we approached, 8 people or so were standing out front pointing up-looking up. i looked too. didn't see anything at first because it had no lighting. then i saw it. it appeared to be flying at about 35,000 feet toward the north east-as if heading to central canada. it was not lit up like or satelite\not in outter space. it appeared to be round in shape,or perhaps squarish. in comparison to a passanger jet at 35,000 feet, it's size was equivelant to maybe 5 passanger jets side by side and 5 passanger jets head to tale long. no quick wavering but it did seem to turn gently to the immediate north. several folks reported seeing a red light on top of it as it approached but over head-silent, and without light. moon was nearly full and out, which helped a little. the objected almost seemed to have a white underside. cool-i actually got to see something weird and saw it with several others.
